General.Name: Mold-Tek Technologies Limited
General.Description: Mold-Tek Technologies Limited provides civil and mechanical design engineering services in India, the United States, and internationally. It offers mechanical engineering services in the automotive, poles and towers, and oil and gas domains, as well as structural engineering services. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Hyderabad, India.
